plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 I am the color of a frog.
🐄 I feed some farm animals.
🌱 You can find me in a field.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I can be many different colors.
👃 You can give me to someone you love.
🐝 I help bees make honey.

plant.question: I grow on trees and monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow.
🐒 Monkeys peel me before they eat me.
🍌 I am long and curved.

plant.question: I am tall and have a woody trunk. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I have branches.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that makes you cry when you chop me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have layers.
😭 I have a strong smell.
🍽️ People use me to flavor food.

plant.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 You can eat me raw or cooked.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!
😎 I'm good for your eyesight.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy treat. You eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow on a cob.
🍿 You need heat to make me pop.
🎬 I'm often covered in butter.

plant.question: I am a red fruit with black seeds on the outside. I am sweet and juicy. What am I?

hints.text: 🍓 I have tiny dots all over.
🌱 Birds and insects eat my seeds.
🌿 You can eat me raw.

plant.question: I have sharp thorns and beautiful flowers. People give me as a gift to show love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red.
🥀 You need to be careful when you pick me.
💌 I am given on Valentine's day.

plant.question: I am a large fruit with a green rind and pink flesh. I am very refreshing on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am mostly water.
👅 Some people like to add salt to me.
🏖️ I am a popular treat in summer.

bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. I am often red or black. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I can carry things much heavier than myself.
Picnic!

bug.question: I fly around and love flowers. I make a sweet treat for you! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🌸 I visit flowers all day long.
🍯 I make something yummy!

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then I fly with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat a lot of leaves when I'm young.
🏡 I build a chrysalis or cocoon.
🦋 I am very pretty when I grow up.

bug.question: I hop and jump with strong back legs, and I make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to live in grassy fields.
🎻 I make music at night.
🦗 I am green.

bug.question: I have spots and am red. People think I bring good luck! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am round and small.
⚫ I have black dots on my back.
🍀 Some people believe I am lucky.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I can be big or small.
🕸️ I live in a web.

bug.question: I light up at night with my little light bulb. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I glow in the dark.
✨ I am a beetle.
🌙 You can see me at night!

bug.question: I march in a line. I work hard and live in a colony underground. What am I?

hints.text: 👷 We are very social insects.
🐜 I can lift things many times my weight.
🏡 I live in a colony.

bug.question: I am a bug that sings loudly in the summer. You can hear me from the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🎵 I have a long life cycle.
🌳 I make a loud buzzing sound.
☀️ You mostly hear me in the summer.

bug.question: I am a bug that loves to eat wood. I live in big groups in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am a pest that damages homes.
🏘️ I live in colonies inside wood.
🔥 Some types of me build tall mounds above the ground.
